mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(a.expdate_start,'%Y-%m-%d'),'') AS expdatStart, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(a.expdate_end,'%Y-%m-%d'),'') AS expdateEnd, FORMAT(a.amount_receivable,2) AS amountReceivable, FORMAT(a.amount_collected,2) as actPay, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(a.extend_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'') AS extendDate, b.room_number AS roomNumber, b.owner_name AS ownerName FROM park_monthly_extend a, park_monthly b WHERE a.monthly_id = b.monthly_id AND a.parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId} AND a.extend_date > #{startDate} AND a.extend_date <= #{endDate} AND CONCAT(IFNULL(b.car_license, '')) LIKE '%${carLicense}%' ORDER BY extend_date DESC
